passives.name: Spirit Drain
passives.effects: Grants 2 ability power for every large monster kill, up to 30 ability power.

passives.name: Butcher
passives.effects: Against monsters, deal 30% bonus damage and restore 6% of damage dealt to monsters as health and 3% as mana.

passives.name: Conservation
passives.effects: You generate Conservation stacks every 1.5 seconds, up to 80. Killing a large monster will consume up to 40 stacks and grant 1 per stack consumed. You may only be in possession of 1 Gold Income item.
